item.title: The Season Has Started, and Carolina is... Good?
item.description: The new season is upon us! We talk about the hot starts of some teams, the horrible starts of others, what Dubas should do with Nylander, and also… is Carolina good?
item.itunes:author: Spencer Meisner and Matt Jennings
item.itunes:subtitle: The new season is upon us! We talk about the hot starts of some teams, the horrible starts of others, what Dubas should do with Nylander, and also… is Carolina good?

item.title: 2019 Season Preview!
item.description: The NHL season is nearly upon us! Matt and Spencer dive into each division, talk about what they think will change, and who will make/miss playoffs this year based on last year’s standings, plus the moves they’ve made this off season. It feels good to be back!
item.itunes:author: Spencer Meisner and Matt Jennings
item.itunes:subtitle: The NHL season is nearly upon us! Matt and Spencer dive into each division, talk about what they think will change, and who will make/miss playoffs this year based on last year’s standings, plus the moves they’ve made this off season. It feels good to be back!

item.content:encoded:
The NHL season is nearly upon us! Matt and Spencer dive into each division, talk about what they think will change, and who will make/miss playoffs this year based on last year’s standings, plus the moves they’ve made this off season. It feels good to be back!


Follow us on Twitter!

  • @Icebreaker_pod
  • @SpencerMeisner
  • @MattJennings44

item.title: Draft Recap, Free Agency, Canucks, and more!
item.description: Boy, when we start talking about free agents, we just go and go! This week’s episode contains a draft recap, trade recaps, free agency preview, a look back at some random years of the Canucks, and of course, goalie talk.
item.itunes:author: Spencer Meisner and Matt Jennings
item.itunes:subtitle: Boy, when we start talking about free agents, we just go and go! This week’s episode contains a draft recap, trade recaps, free agency preview, a look back at some random years of the Canucks, and of course, goalie talk.

item.title: Everything is coming up John (Tavares + Carlson)!
item.description: Oh thank heavens, it’s episode 11. We look back (quickly) at the Stanley Cup Finals, look towards the Draft, and explore possible signing/trade scenarios for Tavares, Carlson, the Islanders, Coyotes, Penguins… almost every team actually.
item.itunes:author: Spencer Meisner and Matt Jennings

item.title: Stanley Cup Final preview, Kane, Dubas, and more!
item.description: What a milestone! 10 episodes! We look back at the Conference Finals, look towards the Stanley Cup finals, and chat about Evander Kane, Kyle Dubas, and John Tavares!
item.itunes:author: Spencer Meisner and Matt Jennings
item.itunes:subtitle: What a milestone! 10 episodes! We look back at the Conference Finals, look towards the Stanley Cup finals, and chat about Evander Kane, Kyle Dubas, and John Tavares!

item.title: Round 2 Review, and Round 3 Preview!
item.description: Taking a look back at round 2, and looking ahead to round 3! Who are the goalies that are good, and who’s garbage?

item.title: Round 1 Analysis, and Round 2 Preview!
item.description: We’ve finished the first round of the 2018 NHL Playoffs, so its time to look back, while also looking ahead. Hear our predictions for round 2, and see how far off we were in round 1.
item.itunes:author: Spencer Meisner and Matt Jennings

item.title: Holland, Vigneault, the Sedins, and a full playoff preview!
item.description: The playoffs are (nearly) here! We touch on Ken Holland’s extension, Vigneault’s firing, the Sedins retiring, and we do a breakdown of each playoff series, and give our predictions! You heard them here first from 2 (non) experts.
item.itunes:author: Spencer Meisner and Matt Jennings
item.itunes:subtitle: The playoffs are (nearly) here! We touch on Ken Holland’s extension, Vigneault’s firing, the Sedins retiring, and we do a breakdown of each playoff series, and give our predictions! You heard them here first from 2 (non) experts.

item.title: Is Yakupov done in the NHL? Who will benefit most from the rising Cap?
item.description: Happy Easter, everyone! It’s Episode 6, and we talk Yakupov, Scott Foster, the rising Cap, and who it benefits most. Plus, we play our first ever game on the podcast!
item.itunes:author: Spencer Meisner and Matt Jennings
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy Easter, everyone! It’s Episode 6, and we talk Yakupov, Scott Foster, the rising Cap, and who it benefits most. Plus, we play our first ever game on the podcast!

item.title: Flames, William Karlsson, and checking in with trade deadline players.
item.description: WE LIVE WITH EPISODE FIVE! Break into a jive. Okay, enough rhyming. Will the Flames make a big trade for a 1st round pick? What’s William Karlsson’s next contract going to look like? We also check in on the players acquired at the deadline.
item.itunes:author: Spencer Meisner and Matt Jennings
item.itunes:subtitle: WE LIVE WITH EPISODE FIVE! Break into a jive. Okay, enough rhyming. Will the Flames make a big trade for a 1st round pick? What’s William Karlsson’s next contract going to look like? We also check in on the players acquired at the deadline.

item.content:encoded:
WE LIVE WITH EPISODE FIVE! Break into a jive. Okay, enough rhyming. Will the Flames make a big trade for a 1st round pick? What’s William Karlsson’s next contract going to look like? We also check in on the players acquired at the deadline.

item.title: Goalie fatigue, the next Carolina GM, THN's Top 100 Prospects
item.description: Are starting goalies playing too much? Who’s going to be Carolina’s next GM? We also take a look at The Hockey News’ new list of the Top 100 NHL Prospects.
item.itunes:author: Spencer Meisner and Matt Jennings
item.itunes:subtitle: Are starting goalies playing too much? Who’s going to be Carolina’s next GM? We also take a look at The Hockey News’ new list of the Top 100 NHL Prospects.

item.title: What is the deal with Carolina, and who is the next backup turned starter in the NHL?
item.description: Every team who doesn’t draft a future starter, tries to find the next starter who is currently another team’s back up. Who is that for the 2018-2019 season?
item.itunes:author: Spencer Meisner and Matt Jennings
item.itunes:subtitle: Every team who doesn’t draft a future starter, tries to find the next starter who is currently another team’s back up. Who is that for the 2018-2019 season?

item.title: Goalies, Goalies, Goalies!
item.description: Hockey goalies are the most confusing of all athletes, but we try and take a stab at figuring them out! We talk Mrazek, Elliot, Niemi, Bishop, and more!
item.itunes:author: Spencer Meisner and Matt Jennings
item.itunes:subtitle: Hockey goalies are the most confusing of all athletes, but we try and take a stab at figuring them out! We talk Mrazek, Elliot, Niemi, Bishop, and more!

item.title: 2018 Trade Deadline
item.description: Our very first episode! We dive into the moves made at the deadline, and look towards playoffs to see who can ultimately take home the Stanley Cup.
